info.title: Hiboo API
info.description:
The all-in-one API for your equipment data, operations, and maintenance

# Introduction
The Hiboo API is built on HTTPS.
Our API is RESTful. It has predictable resource URLs.
It returns HTTP response codes to indicate errors.
It also accepts and returns JSON in the HTTP body.
You can use your favorite HTTP/REST library for your programming language to use Hiboo's REST API.

# Authentication
To use the Hiboo REST API you must first have an existing account on Hiboo.
Once you have an account, you can request for API access to our Hiboo team.
After getting the API permission you are free to use the Hiboo REST API for your needs.

Our authentication system use `x-access-token` for validating the request. You can get the token after the sucessful login.

Never share your secret keys. Keep them guarded and secure.

# Usage of token
For token usage use `x-access-token` header parameter with the token as a value field.

category.description: The category must exist beforehand and will not be created if it does not exist

SnapshotOfSpecificEquipment.description: Snapshot of the specified device for all kinds

SnapshotOfTheEquipmentForSpecificDate.description: Snapshot of the equipment on specific date

date.description: Date of the daily usage fetched

Login.description: Token to use in the other API calls

EquipmentsHistory.description: List of equipment with their history

severity.description: Severity of the error * -1 - Unknown * 0 - Information * 1 - Warning * 2 - Error

percent.description: Perentage of fuel remaining in the asset's tank.

running.description: True if engine went from running to stopped. False if engine went from stopped to running.

operatingHours.description: The total number of engine hours on this date

idleHours.description: The total number of idle engine hours on this date

workingHours.description: The total number of "useful" e.g. non-idle engine hours on this date

fuelUsed.description: The total of liter of fuel used on this date

dailyDistance.description: Number of kilometers traveled on this date

cumulativeIdleHours.description: The last available cumulativeIdleHours of the day or null if none available

cumulativeOperatingHours.description: The last available cumulativeOperatingHours of the day or null if none available

cumulativeFuelUsed.description: The last available cumulativeFuelUsed of the day or null if none available

cumulativeDistance.description: The last available cumulativeDistance of the day or null if none available

cumulativeLoadCount.description: The number of cycles performed by the machine.

cumulativePayloadTotal.description: Total payload lifted, hauled or processed by the machine.

cumulativeActiveRegenerationHours.description: The time when the machine is placed in a non-productive state to complete the regeneration process.

cumulativePowerTakeOffHours.description: The time the power take off was driving an implement such as a mower or sprayer.

peakDailySpeed.description: Used to monitor excessive machine speed to identify machine misuse or underuse.

averageDailyEngineLoadFactor.description: The percentage calculated as the actual fuel consumed over the previous 24 h period divided by the fuel that would have been consumed during that period if the machine had been continually operated at the engine’s rated output.

percent.description: The percent of DEF — Diesel exhaust fluid — remaining is used to schedule DEF delivery to the vehicle

tankCapacity.description: The maximum capacity of the DEF tank.

EquipmentHistory.description: Specific equipment details with its history

401.description: Unable to authenticate the provided credentials

get.description: Returns the list of all equipments and their identity

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: Obtained with a successful login

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The numbers of items to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

get.description: ⚠️ This endpoint will be deprecated in a future version. Returns the list of all equipments and their history (positions, daily usages, fault codes)

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: Obtained with a successful login

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Fetch the data since this date. Expected format is 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ'

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Fetch the data until this date. Expected format is 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ'

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The numbers of items to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

get.description: Returns the details of single equipment and its history (positions, daily usages, fault codes)

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: Obtained with a successful login

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the equipment

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Fetch the data since this date. Expected format is 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ'

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Fetch the data until this date. Expected format is 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ'

get.description: Returs the list of all equipments snapshot

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: Obtained with a successful login

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The numbers of items to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Optional - if provided it will return the equipment with a fleet number or serialNumber matching the parameter

get.description: Returns the last information available for all data kinds for specific equipment

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: Obtained with a successful login

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the equipment

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date of the snapshot

200.description: JSON object containig the snapshot of the equipment

get.description: Returns all data available for one dataKind for specific equipment. It's the timeseries mindset of the ISO/AEMP standard.

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: Obtained with a successful login

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the equipment

parameters.name: dataKind
parameters.description: Any of data kinds (positions, cumulativeOperatingHours, dailyUsages, cumulativeIdleHours,cumulativeUsageHours, cumulativeLoadCount, cumulativePayloadTotal, averageDailyEngineLoadFactor, cumulativePowerTakeOffHours,     cumulativeActiveRegenerationHours, engineCondition, peakDailySpeed, cumulativeFuel, defRemainingRatio, fuelRemaining)

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Fetch the data since this date. Expected format is 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ'

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Fetch the data until this date. Expected format is 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ'

patch.summary: Update equipment data with assetId OR serialNumber and make

500.description: An error occured while processing the request

post.summary: Add asset workspaces data with assetId OR serialNumber and make of Asset and worspace names

500.description: An error occured while processing the request

delete.summary: delete link asset and  workspaces data with assetId OR serialNumber and make of Asset and worspace names

200.description: Equipment has been unlink between asset and workspace

500.description: An error occured while processing the request

post.summary: add assetCustomFields data with assetId OR serialNumber and make

500.description: An error occured while processing the request

delete.summary: delete assetCustomFields data with assetId OR serialNumber and make and customfields

500.description: An error occured while processing the request
